title: US Real Estate Paralegal
job_overview:
Established west coast US real estate law firm team seeks to find a long term, permanent, teaUpgrade to see actual infomber to work with us on tasks including completion of form-driven pleading sets, factual research about real property, drafting conveyance deeds, drafting loan documents, proofreading, court filings and general office support. Progressive responsibilities may include legal research, discovery tasks and legal drafting, if the candidate wishes to do that sort of work. The rate is $4-8 dollars per hour, depending on your work experience.

You will join a team of five in-person workers and four VAs.  

Great candidates will have 1-2+ years experience as a legal assistant, paralegal, or lawyer; general experience with the civil litigation process, specific experience with real estate law and transactions, excellent written English, MS office suite literacy, organized and detail oriented.

Our expectations are you will work a fulltime work load, you will work only for this company, and you are available during Pacific Los Angeles time zone working hours.  Daily deliverables include an end of day report and contemporaneous logging of time entries in our practice management software.  

Please do not send us any AI-generated emails or writing samples. The application process is our important opportunity to get to know who you are as a written communicator.
